name: Scolcoin
description: Scolcoin is a Colombian Start Up with social sense, The project was born on January 3, 2018 when we started the platform from scratch, consisting of pioneering committees with more than 150 Colombians, we performed technical development and marketing operations, introducing the Blockchain of Colombia to a very select public of Latin America, Scolcoin unique for its characteristics that make it a bridge between technology and solidarity, Our Project has its own chain of blocks with more than 50 servers spread around the world, with the support of a technical team and of great human quality, we now have within the member committees of Venezuela, Peru, Argentina, Chile, Brazil, Mexico, Spain, among others. We are generating a lot of interest in our social technology application, it could be a solution for the corruption of our region, we have a block explorer where we can observe the transactions from origin, sent crypto assets to and from Colombia, an option for specialists of the exchange called trade and most importantly our social commitment, we look for altruistic trade, social responsibility and solidarity projects, in our bet Scol integrated to your project or better called Whitepaper see 1.4 the 17 Sustainable Development Goals (ODS) to work them together with the reserve or fund that we have designed in our platform.
